original_text: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.
korean_text: 밤이 깊고 낮이 가까웠으니 그러므로 우리가 어둠의 일을 벗고 빛의 갑옷을 입자

sentences.original_text: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness
and let us put on the armour of light
